Select a Factory to get access to Build.message: Select a Factory to get access to Build Bar

[style=text_callout]Control + Left Click.message: [style=text_callout]Control + Left Click[/style] a unit to make a factory produce a single one of that unit before continuing with the rest of the build queue.

[style=text_callout]Left Click[/style] u.message: [style=text_callout]Left Click[/style] units on Build Bar to build

[style=text_callout]Right Click[/style].message: [style=text_callout]Right Click[/style] or [style=text_callout]Shift + Right Click[/style] on units to reduce number of units in queue

[style=text_callout]Shift + Left Click[/.message: [style=text_callout]Shift + Left Click[/style] units on Build Bar to build multiple
